name: pdf-splitter
title: PDF Splitter
description: Split a PDF document into individual single-page PDF files
content:
Overview

This application splits a PDF document into separate single-page PDF files. Built using PyMuPDF, it preserves the original quality and formatting of each page.

Features

  • Split any PDF into individual single-page files
  • Preserves original page formatting and quality
  • Numbered output files for easy sorting
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • PDF File: Upload your PDF file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the split PDF files

Output

The application generates individual PDF files named with zero-padded page numbers (e.g., document_page_001.pdf, document_page_002.pdf, etc.). Each file contains exactly one page from the original document.

Use Cases

  • Extracting specific pages from large documents
  • Distributing individual pages to different recipients
  • Creating separate files for each form or invoice
  • Preparing pages for individual processing or editing
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/pdf_splitter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
